verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: You are my strength when I am weak you are the treasure that I seek...you are my all in all

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Seeking you as a precious jewel Lord to give up I'd be a fool you are my all in all

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Jesus lamb of God worthy is your name

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Taking my sin my cross my shame, rising again I bless your name...you are my all in all

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: When I fall down you pick me up when I am dry you fill my cup..you are my all in all
